channel.title: ~Tut how to delete runescape logo on your client and to rename objects~
channel.description:
[CENTER][U]Editing Any Client
[B]Intruduction[/B] Well, This is Aj, Just wanted to help people on how to edit Bluurs client. There are many guides in here. All written by me. There will be difficulty on some of them, But some easy. It's all in your head that makes it difficult. Hope you enjoy my thread. ~ Aj(`True as username)
[B]Removing The Runescape Logo [U]Editing What Kind[/U] - Removing the runescape logo
Difficulty - As hard as you make it
[U]Files used [/U]- Client.java
[B][U]This Client is used on Bluurs Client[/U][/B]
First Please open up "[B]Client.java[/B]" Then Hold down "[B]Ctrl+F[/B]" Then Search up "[B]logo[/B]"
[U]What should come up[/U] - [CODE] class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "[B]logo[/B]", 0); aClass15_1107.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18);[/CODE]
[U]What should do after finding[/U] - Simply Delete.
Next step - Save and compile.
Credits - True - 90% Jagex - 10% - Making RS [B][ End of "Removing Logo" Tutorial ][/B]
[B]Editing object names
[U]Editing what kind[/U] - Editing object names
[U]Difficulty[/U] - Very easy.
[U]Files used[/U] - Class46.java
[B][U]This is used in any client[/U][/B]
First open up "[B]Class46.java[/B]" Hold down keys "[B]Ctrl+F[/B]" Search for - [CODE]class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753);[/CODE] After you find the topic ontop. Now under it Add - [CODE]if(i == ####) { class46.aString739 = "OBJECTNAME"; // Place name here }[/CODE]
Now change the #### to your object ID, OBJECT NAME to any name you want.
Credits - Me - 90% Jagex - 10% - Making Rs [B][ End of Object name changing ][/B]
[B]More coming soon..[/B]
[B][SIZE="4"]For any suggestions for turtiols please reply with one, and i will add them here. [/SIZE][/CENTER]

item.description:
@owned654321241 wrote:

Can someone post what is right before this…

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357); //class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0); //aClass15_1107.method237(0); //class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18);

because i deleted all 4 lines and i want to go back and check nenitindo’s way of doing it.

item.dc:creator: @nentindo2005 nentindo2005
item.description:
@nentindo2005 wrote:

ok the only way i got this to work on bluurs client was like this:

class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357); //class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "logo", 0); //aClass15_1107.method237(0); //class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18);

the first line ONLY shouldn’t be deleted or commented out.
the other 3 should

item.title: ~Tut how to delete runescape logo on your client and to rename objects~
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

[CENTER][U]Editing
Any Client

Intruduction
Well, This is Aj, Just wanted to help people on how to edit Bluurs client. There are many guides in here. All written by me. There will be difficulty on some of them, But some easy. It’s all in your head that makes it difficult. Hope you enjoy my thread. ~ Aj(`True as username)

[B]Removing The Runescape Logo
Editing What Kind - Removing the runescape logo

Difficulty - As hard as you make it

Files used - Client.java

This Client is used on Bluurs Client

First Please open up “Client.java”
Then Hold down “Ctrl+F”
Then Search up “logo”

What should come up - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method346(-180, -171, -32357); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1(aClass44_1053, "[B]logo[/B]", 0); aClass15_1107.method237(0); class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.method348(382 - class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.anInt1440 / 2 - 128, 16083, 18);

What should do after finding - Simply Delete.

Next step - Save and compile.

Credits -
True - 90%
Jagex - 10% - Making RS
[ End of “Removing Logo” Tutorial ]

[B]Editing object names

Editing what kind - Editing object names

Difficulty - Very easy.

Files used - Class46.java

This is used in any client

First open up “Class46.java”
Hold down keys “Ctrl+F”
Search for - class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753);
After you find the topic ontop. Now under it Add - if(i == ####) { class46.aString739 = "OBJECTNAME"; // Place name here }

Now change the #### to your object ID, OBJECT NAME to any name you want.

Credits -
Me - 90%
Jagex - 10% - Making Rs
[ End of Object name changing ]

More coming soon…

[B][SIZE=“4”]For any suggestions for turtiols please reply with one, and i will add them here. [/SIZE][/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: ~Tut how to delete runescape logo on your client and to rename objects~
